name: Laravel Boost
description: Laravel development toolkit MCP server. Provides intelligent assistance for Laravel applications including Artisan commands, Eloquent queries, routing, migrations, and framework-specific code generation.
longDescription: MCP server that runs via `php artisan boost:mcp` inside your Laravel project. Provides context-aware tools for running Artisan commands, building Eloquent queries, managing routes, generating migrations, and scaffolding Laravel-specific code. Requires Laravel Boost to be installed as a Composer dependency in your project.
